title: Why Glenn Is Canceling His Disney Subscription | Guests: Donald Trump Jr. & Rep. Chip Roy | 3/30/22
description:
Glenn discusses Disney’s announcement that it will push the LGBTQ+ agenda in its content and compares it to Walt Disney’s original intent for the company. Rep. Chip Roy joins to discuss a case in Finland regarding two people being prosecuted for their faith and how to stand up against the woke ideology. Donald Trump Jr., co-founder of MxM News, joins to discuss the platform, which will compete with Apple News. Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to discuss Disney’s latest move toward indoctrinating your children. Glenn gives an update on the Hunter Biden laptop story, dubbing it the "Biden crime family" story. Jason Buttrill, head writer and researcher for Glenn Beck, joins to discuss the Biden crime family story to make sense of it all.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
